```{r, include=FALSE}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls())

# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(xgboost)
library(doParallel)
```

```{r}
# load in train and test
obp_train <- read.csv('./project/volume/data/interim/obp_train_1.csv', 
                      stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
obp_train <- as_tibble(obp_train)

obp_test <- read.csv('./project/volume/data/interim/obp_test_1.csv', 
                     stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
obp_test <- as_tibble(obp_test)
```

```{r}
# create model specification
obp_gbt_spec <- boost_tree(mtry = tune(),
                           trees = tune(),
                           min_n = tune(),
                           tree_depth = tune(),
                           #learn_rate = tune(),
                           #loss_reduction = tune(),
                           sample_size = 0.95) %>%
                set_mode("regression") %>%
                set_engine("xgboost")
obp_gbt_spec

#args(boost_tree)
```

```{r}
# create model recipe to preprocess data
obp_gbt_rec <- recipe(FullSeason_OBP ~ ., data = obp_train) %>%
               update_role(playerid, Name, Team, new_role = "ID") %>%
               step_normalize(all_predictors())
obp_gbt_rec
```

```{r}
# create regular grid of values for tuning
obp_gbt_grid <- grid_regular(mtry(range = c(1, 25)),
                             trees(),
                             min_n(),
                             tree_depth(),
                             #learn_rate(),
                             #loss_reduction(),
                             #sample_prop(range = c(0.75, 1.0)),
                             levels = 10)
obp_gbt_grid
```

```{r}
# view values in grid
obp_gbt_grid %>% count(min_n) # change hyperparameter to view its tested values
```

```{r}
set.seed(2008)

# create cross-validation folds
obp_folds <- vfold_cv(obp_train, v = 10)
glimpse(obp_folds)
```

```{r}
# create workflow and tune along grid
all_cores <- parallel::detectCores()
cl <- makePSOCKcluster(all_cores)
registerDoParallel(cl)

set.seed(2008)

obp_gbt_wf <- workflow() %>%
             add_model(obp_gbt_spec) %>%
             add_recipe(obp_gbt_rec)

obp_gbt_res <- obp_gbt_wf %>%
               tune_grid(resamples = obp_folds,
                         grid = obp_gbt_grid,
                         control = control_grid(save_pred = TRUE,
                                                save_workflow = TRUE),
                         metrics = metric_set(rmse, mae))

stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r}
# collect cv results
saveRDS(obp_gbt_res, './project/volume/models/obp_gbt_res_1.rds')

#obp_gbt_res %>% collect_predictions()
obp_gbt_res %>% collect_metrics()
obp_gbt_res %>% show_best("rmse")
```

```{r}
# select best hyperparameters
obp_best_gbt <- obp_gbt_res %>%
               select_best("rmse")
obp_best_gbt
```

```{r}
obp_gbt_metric <- obp_gbt_res %>% collect_metrics()
obp_gbt_metric[obp_gbt_metric$.config == 'Preprocessor1_Model07028',]
```

```{r}
# record results for final model selection
obp_gbt_rmse <- 0.02910991
saveRDS(obp_gbt_rmse, './project/volume/data/processed/obp_gbt_rmse_1.rds')
obp_gbt_mae <- 0.02370181

```
